\doxysubsection{Detailed Description}
\subsubsection*{template$<$typename T, class Alloc = std\+::allocator$<$\+T$>$$>$\newline
class open\+\_\+cpp\+\_\+utils\+::directed\+\_\+tree$<$ T, Alloc $>$}
Class for creating a directed tree. 


\begin{DoxyTemplParams}{Template Parameters}
{\em T} & Type of the data associated with each node\\
\hline
\end{DoxyTemplParams}
The tree is a series of child nodes in forward linked lists.
